TreasureBlox - The Worlds biggets internet and real world crypto treasure hunt.
How it works?
Step 1
Purchase Blox, enter a treasure quest maybe even purchase a head start. All quests have different entry requirements. Token holders with more than 1Billion tokens are automatically entered and get head starts on all games.
Step 2
Think you know the answer? Purchase a time lock for 90 seconds where you are the only player who can answer the secret.
Final Step
Once the Time lock is purchased you can enter your secret. If you win so does the community as 10x the prize is burnt from the total token supply.

 Purchase Blox

); } export default Home;
